          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ugotovi kotni  pospešek</string>
            <string language="en">Determine angular acceleration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie eckige Beschleunigung fest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez l'accélération angulaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine o acceleration angular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini l'accelerazione angolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε τη γωνιακή ταχύτητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determine la aceleración angular</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Otrok sedi na vrtiljaku, ki se počasi ustavlja.</string>
            <string language="en">The child is sited on a merry-go-round which is slowly stopping.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kotni pospešek</string>
            <string language="en">angular acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vrtenje</string>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Kind wird auf einem Merry-go-round 
stationiert, der langsam stoppt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'enfant est situé sur un manège qui s'arrête 
lentement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A criança é situada em um merry-go-round que 
esteja parando lentamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il bambino è situato su un merry-go-round che 
sta arrestandosi lentamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιδί εγκαθίσταται σε έναν εύθυμος-πηγαίνω-κύκλο 
που σταματά αργά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Localizan al niño en un tiovivo que esté 
parando lentamente.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
